name: Negative asteroids
description:
Negative asteroids, is a game that was inspired by classic game 'asteroids'.

This game hovewer, is a little harder because you must be aware of 2 types of asteroids: black ones and white ones. You can change your color by pressing space. 

When your color is black, you can attack white asteroids, but can't see and attack the black ones. Same for white.

Controll your spaceship by pressing W and mouse. You can also shoot by pressing left mouse button.

SPACE to change color.

And R to restart.

--This game was made for trijam#61 in 2.33h. --
